channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 日元等待日本央行关注，美元持稳
item.description: The yen languished near a two-month low on Tuesday ahead of a closely-watched policy decision by the Bank of Japan (BOJ) where expectations are for the central bank to stand pat on its ultra-loose monetary policy settings.翻译:在日本央行(BOJ)做出备受关注的政策决定之前，日元周二徘徊在两个月低点附近，预计日本央行将维持其超宽松的货币政策环境。
item.author: Rae Wee

item.title: 中国音乐学生因涉嫌威胁活动人士而面临美国审判
item.description: A Chinese music student went on trial on Monday on U.S. charges that he harassed an activist who posted fliers at the Berklee College of Music in Boston supporting democracy in China and threatened to report her activities to Chinese law enforcement.翻译:周一，一名中国音乐学生在美国受审，罪名是骚扰一名在波士顿伯克利音乐学院张贴支持中国民主传单的活动人士，并威胁要向中国执法部门举报她的活动。
item.author: Nate Raymond

item.title: 中国“复苏乏力”对美国经济没有产生强烈影响——布雷纳德
item.description: China's lackluster economic recovery has not had a particularly strong effect on the U.S. economy given diversification of supply chains over the past years, White House National Economic Council Director Lael Brainard said on Monday.翻译:白宫国家经济委员会主任莱尔·布雷纳德周一表示，鉴于过去几年供应链的多元化，中国经济复苏乏力并未对美国经济产生特别强烈的影响。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 解释者：为什么加拿大要限制外国学生以及谁会受到影响？
item.description: Canada on Monday announced a two-year cap on the intake of foreign students after explosive growth in recent years aggravated the country's housing shortage. Last year Canada issued nearly 1 million study permits, about three times that of a decade ago, according to government data. The new proposal will cut the intake by nearly a third.翻译:加拿大周一宣布，在近年来的爆炸性增长加剧了该国的住房短缺之后，对外国学生的入学人数实行两年上限。根据政府数据，去年加拿大发放了近 100 万份学习许可，约为十年前的三倍。新提案将减少近三分之一的摄入量。
item.author: Wa Lone

item.title: 中国科考船前往马尔代夫可能引起印度担忧
item.description: A Chinese research vessel is on its way to the Maldives, according to an Indian military official and an independent researcher, as new Maldivian President Mohamed Muizzu deepens ties with Beijing, distancing from New Delhi.翻译:据印度军方官员和独立研究人员称，随着马尔代夫新总统穆罕默德·穆伊祖深化与北京的关系，远离新德里，一艘中国科考船正在前往马尔代夫。
item.author: Krishn Kaushik

item.title: 独家：中国游说各国在联合国审查前赞扬其人权记录——外交官
item.description: China has been lobbying non-Western countries to praise its human rights record ahead of a key U.N. meeting where it will face questions and criticism over its actions in Hong Kong and Xinjiang, according to diplomats and documents.翻译:据外交官和文件称，中国一直在游说非西方国家在联合国重要会议之前赞扬其人权记录，届时中国将因其在香港和新疆的行为而面临质疑和批评。
item.author: Emma Farge

item.title: 数据显示，在中国销量依然疲软的情况下，外国汽车品牌增加了出口
item.description: Foreign carmakers that have been losing market share to local rivals in China have boosted exports from the world's largest auto market, accounting for more than a fifth of the country's total vehicle exports last year, industry data showed.翻译:行业数据显示，一直在输给中国本土竞争对手市场份额的外国汽车制造商增加了中国这个全球最大汽车市场的出口，占中国去年汽车出口总额的五分之一以上。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 汇丰银行董事长对中国投资“充满信心”，会见副行长 - 官方媒体
item.description: China's Vice President Han Zheng on Monday met with HSBC Chairman Mark Tucker in Beijing and urged the banking giant to deepen cooperation with China to improve Hong Kong's status as a financial centre, the official Xinhua news agency reported.翻译:据官方新华社报道，中国国家副主席韩正周一在北京会见汇丰银行董事长马克·塔克，敦促这家银行业巨头深化与中国的合作，以提高香港的金融中心地位。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 2023年中国住宅丧失抵押品赎回权将增加43%
item.description: The number of foreclosed homes in China rose 43% year-on-year in 2023, according to a private survey on Monday, highlighting a worrying trend of rising mortgage delinquencies amid a sustained property market slump and a patchy economic recovery.翻译:周一的一项私人调查显示，2023年中国止赎房屋数量同比增长43%，突显出在房地产市场持续低迷和经济复苏不平衡的情况下，抵押贷款拖欠率上升的令人担忧的趋势。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 尽管经济放缓，北京仍提高了2024年的增长目标
item.description: China's capital city Beijing has set a growth target of around 5% for 2024, surpassing last year's target of above 4.5%, despite expectations of slower growth for the national economy.翻译:尽管国民经济增长预期放缓，但中国首都北京仍设定了2024年5%左右的增长目标，超过了去年4.5%以上的目标。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国在漫画中警告其稀土面临“海外”威胁
item.description: China's chief intelligence agency posted on social media a comic strip featuring foreign-looking characters secretly extracting rare earths, in a story portraying the country's strategic metals under threat from covetous "overseas organisations".翻译:中国首席情报机构在社交媒体上发布了一幅连环漫画，其中有外国角色秘密开采稀土，故事描绘了中国的战略金属受到贪婪的“海外组织”的威胁。
item.author: Liz Lee

item.title: 独家：随着股市暴跌，中国采取行动支持人民币
item.description: China's major state-owned banks moved to support the yuan on Monday, tightening liquidity in the offshore foreign exchange market while actively selling U.S. dollars onshore as equities slid, four sources with knowledge of the matter said.翻译:四位知情人士称，中国主要国有银行周一采取行动支持人民币，收紧离岸外汇市场的流动性，同时随着股市下跌，在岸积极抛售美元。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 伦敦股市上涨，房屋建筑商大放异彩，中国疲软拖累矿业股
item.description: UK stocks climbed on Monday after a record-setting rally on Wall Street helped outweigh concerns about a slowing British economy and sticky inflation, while homebuilders advanced with Persimmon leading the outperformance in the sector.翻译:英国股市周一攀升，华尔街创纪录的涨势帮助盖过了对英国经济放缓和通胀粘性的担忧，而房屋建筑商则上涨，其中 Persimmon 领涨该行业。
item.author: Sruthi Shankar, Shubham Batra

item.title: 在对限制查阅裁决的计划提出强烈抗议后，中国誓言司法披露
item.description: China's top court has pledged to "deepen judicial disclosure" after its plan to curtail access to court decisions faced unusual public criticism from lawyers and legal experts.翻译:在限制查阅法院判决的计划遭到律师和法律专家不同寻常的公开批评后，中国最高法院承诺“深化司法公开”。
item.author: Laurie Chen

item.title: 中国新疆南部发生里氏5.1级地震 - GFZ
item.description: A magnitude 5.1 earthquake struck southern Xinjiang, China on Monday, the German Research Centre for Geosciences (GFZ)said.翻译:德国地球科学研究中心（GFZ）表示，周一，中国新疆南部发生了 5.1 级地震。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国不顾制裁让俄罗斯在2023年成为最大石油供应国
item.description: Russia leapfrogged Saudi Arabia to become China's top crude oil supplier in 2023, data showed on Saturday, as the world's biggest crude importer defied Western sanctions to purchase vast quantities of discounted oil for its processing plants.翻译:周六的数据显示，俄罗斯将在 2023 年超越沙特阿拉伯，成为中国最大的原油供应国，因为全球最大的原油进口国不顾西方制裁，为其加工厂购买大量折扣石油。
item.author: Andrew Hayley

item.title: 中国大使馆警告韩国整形手术风险
item.description: China's embassy in Seoul has warned citizens against the dangers of having plastic surgery done in South Korea, from the risk of death to major facial changes that make it difficult to pass through immigration checks.翻译:中国驻首尔大使馆警告公民注意在韩国进行整形手术的危险，从死亡风险到导致难以通过移民检查的重大面部变化。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国基金经理自掏腰包推出股票基金
item.description: In the face of intense pressure from authorities to help revive a sickly stock market, Chinese fund management companies are increasingly launching equity funds that are bankrolled mostly by the firm's own money.翻译:面对当局要求重振病态股市的巨大压力，中国基金管理公司越来越多地推出主要由公司自有资金提供资金的股票基金。
item.author: Samuel Shen, Vidya Ranganathan

item.title: 红海航运袭击给中国出口商造成延误、成本上升的压力
item.description: For Chinese businessman Han Changming, disruptions to Red Sea freight are threatening the survival of his trading company in the eastern province of Fujian.翻译:对于中国商人韩昌明来说，红海货运中断正威胁着他位于东部福建省的贸易公司的生存。
item.author: Samuel Shen, Casey Hall, Ellen Zhang

item.title: 中国与毛泽东时代的增长调情
item.description: The latest readouts on economic and population trends in China are remarkable, highlighting the immense long-term challenges ahead and dragging the growth profile of the world's second-largest economy back to the insular days of the 1970s.翻译:关于中国经济和人口趋势的最新数据引人注目，突显了未来巨大的长期挑战，并将世界第二大经济体的增长状况拖回了 20 世纪 70 年代的孤立时期。
item.author: Jamie McGeever
